content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: SETCD
      operator: is_not_unique_relationship
      value: SET
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.237
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Each SETCD/SET is a unique pair.
Outcome:
  Message: The combination of SETCD and SET is not a unique pair
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '237'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: 'SETCD: Short name of the Trial Set. SET: Long description
                  of a specific Trial Set, as defined by the sponsor.'
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TX

json.Description: Each SETCD/SET is a unique pair.

Outcome.Message: The combination of SETCD and SET is not a unique pair

Citations.Cited_Guidance: SETCD: Short name of the Trial Set. SET: Long description of a specific Trial Set, as defined by the sponsor.
